description:
Alterations during the course of construction including introduction of alternative A3 or retail use at basement level, provision of disabled access and elevational changes. (Option 1 with car park access from Britton Street) (Amendment to planning permissions dated 21st March, 1990 and 2nd September, 1997 Refs. 89/1097 and 97/0791). 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  4209/A/010,011,012,013,014,015,                         016,017,018,020A,021A,022A,023A,                         024,030A,040A,041
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
